MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Mill Lane and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.55AM on 15th February 2021.
